data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Use MIDI::Trans for fast and easy design and implementation of text
    to MIDI conversion algorithms. Wraps around MIDI::Simple, providing
    plug-and-play implementation with as little as three callbacks
    defined by the user. Handles all aspects of reading and parsing
    corpus, executing callbacks on each element, creating score and
    writing output.
